Hi Holly, Thanks for requesting me. You write an interesting question. Many people think they can’t monetize their niche. I believe you can monetize any niche. How? Easy! Combine your blog posts together in an ebook! Many independent authors publish their ebooks on Amazon.com. I have 3 myself! Amazon makes everything easy for you. They design a cover, and upload your ebook from Word. Just combine your articles on Word and upload to Amazon. Amazon will even print your paperbacks for you upon order. Amazon takes a third of the sale but you pay for convenience which I appreciate. My guest author, a publisher, wrote an article explaining how to monetize the knowledge you put in your blog posts. Here you go: This Is How to Monetize Your Knowledge & Make Money Blogging These strategies should give you ideas for monetizing your blog by writing. She talks about monetizing your knowledge as well as your services. The article was written in 2016 but are still applicable today. Janice
